      • isPending

        public boolean isPending(String key)
        Returns true if resource with specified cache key is already in the process of being cached. This check helps clients prevent attempting to cache the same resource multiple times.
        Specified by:
        isPending in interface ResourceCacheInterface
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:

      • put

        public void put(ReliableResource reliableResource)
        Called by ReliableResourceDownloadManager when resource has completed being cached to disk and is ready to be added to the cache map.
        Specified by:
        put in interface ResourceCacheInterface
        Parameters:
        reliableResource - the resource to add to the cache map

      • removePendingCacheEntry

        public void removePendingCacheEntry(String cacheKey)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceCacheInterface
        Removes resource from list of pending resources being added to cache. This can help when multiple clients may be interacting with the same cache in order to prevent multiple copies of the same resource being cached.
        Specified by:
        removePendingCacheEntry in interface ResourceCacheInterface

      • addPendingCacheEntry

        public void addPendingCacheEntry(ReliableResource reliableResource)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceCacheInterface
        Adds resource to list of resources in process of being cached. This can help when multiple clients may be interacting with the same cache in order to prevent multiple copies of the same resource being cached.
        Specified by:
        addPendingCacheEntry in interface ResourceCacheInterface

      • getValid

        public Resource getValid(String key,
                         Metacard latestMetacard)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceCacheInterface
        Gets a valid resource from the cache.

        A valid resource is one where the corresponding Metacard in the Catalog has not changed since its resource was cached.

        Specified by:
        getValid in interface ResourceCacheInterface
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        Resource, null if not found.

      • containsValid

        public boolean containsValid(String key,
                             Metacard latestMetacard)
        States whether an item is in the cache or not.
        Specified by:
        containsValid in interface ResourceCacheInterface
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        true if items exists in cache.

      • validateCacheEntry

        protected boolean validateCacheEntry(ReliableResource cachedResource,
                                     Metacard latestMetacard)
        Compares the Metacard in a ReliableResource pulled from cache with a Metacard obtained directly from the Catalog to ensure they are the same. Typically used to determine if the cache entry is out-of-date based on the Catalog having an updated Metacard.
        Parameters:
        cachedResource -
        latestMetacard -
        Returns:
        true if the cached ReliableResource still matches the most recent Metacard from the Catalog, false otherwise
